DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To analyze effect cold water immersion ( CWI ) recovery clinical , biochemical , functional neuromuscular marker muscle damage 10 km street runner . Materials Methods : This randomize , blind trial 30 subject , 10 km street runner , randomly divide three group : control ( gC ) , immersion ( gI ) CWI ( gCWI ) . The runner evaluate clinical ( subjective perception exertion ) , biochemical ( serum CK ) , functional ( unipodal triple hop distance shuttle test time ) neuromuscular variable mean isokinetic variable ( peak torque , total work fatigue index ) . Volunteers perform pre-assessment , immediately post-race post-intervention , 24-hour post-intervention . The data express mean standard deviation , analyzed statistical package SPSS 20.0 . A significance level 5 % 95 % confidence interval consider measure .
DOC.brief_title: Cold Water Immersion Recovery Markers Muscle Damage 10km Street Runners
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index 18.5 30 kg/m2 ; Street runner least 6 month ; Week frequency least 3 time ; Do present cardiopathy , muscle neurological disease ; Hypersensitivity allergies cryotherapy ; Unable complete 10 km event day evaluation ; Do complete perform study procedure reason ( phobia , withstand exposure time ) .
